ing: 2 fluid ounces freshly squeezed grapefruit juice
1 1/2 fluid ounces freshly squeezed pomegranate juice
des: "This cocktail is crisp and elegant, with deep, earthy notes and a ruby color."
ins: Place vodka, grapefruit juice, pomegranate juice, vermouth, cream of balsamic, cranberry juice, and peppercorns in a cocktail shaker. Fill shaker with ice and shake well; strain into a martini glass. Sprinkle with orange zest.
